price: Wͻn a wͻ’suro Nyankopͻn na wͻ’yε ahwεyie no akontabuo nna wͻn (boniayεfoͻ) no so koraa, (na mmom wͻn asεdeε nesε) wͻ’bεkaekae (wͻn) sεdeε wͻ’bεyε ahwεyie.
arabic: وَمَا عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ يَتَّقُونَ مِنۡ حِسَابِهِم مِّن شَيۡءٖ وَلَٰكِن ذِكۡرَىٰ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wamā ʿalā alladhīna yattaqūna min ḥisābihim min shayin walākin dhik'rā laʿallahum yattaqūna
